name: Surging Undercurrent
title: Abyss Herald: Surging Undercurrent

attributes.source: Reward for accepting the Tavern Challenge against the Abyss Herald: Wicked Torrents at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives in a Friendly Fracas

skills.desc: When played: If Abyss Herald: Wicked Torrents, who has this card equipped, has already triggered Watery Rebirth, then create 1 Curse of the Undercurrent on the opposing playing field. When Abyss Herald: Wicked Torrents, who has this card equipped, is defeated or triggers Watery Rebirth: Create 1 Curse of the Undercurrent on the opposing playing field. (You must have Abyss Herald: Wicked Torrents in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
